sentences.english: Give no artificial teats or pacifiers (also called dummies or soothers) to breastfeeding infants.
sentences.chinese: 对母乳喂养的婴儿不要使用人工奶嘴或橡皮奶头。

sentences.english: Can I pump directly into Lansinoh? Breastmilk Storage Bags?
sentences.chinese: 我能否直接把母乳挤到储奶袋中？

sentences.english: Due to its fatty acid profile the Gold formula can be considered closer to breast milk than goat formula.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于脂肪比例，金装佩方奶是比羊奶更接近母乳。

sentences.english: Due to its fatty acid profile, the Gold formula can be considered closer to breast milk than goat formula.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于脂肪比例，金装配方奶是比羊奶更接近母乳。
然而独独没有包括母乳。

sentences.english: Objective discuss the function of smecta on neonate Breast-feeding jaundice.
sentences.chinese: 目的为探讨思密达在新生儿母乳性黄疸中的作用。

sentences.english: In addition, certain hormonal changes during breast-feeding may contribute to bone-density loss.
sentences.chinese: 另外，母乳喂养期间激素的变化也会使骨密度降低。

sentences.english: The decline in breastfeeding has become a major concern to health workers.
sentences.chinese: 母乳哺喂率下降之关注议题已经考量到职场员工。

sentences.english: Breastfeeding pamphlets are available in our hospital to help you.
sentences.chinese: 本院提供之母乳育婴资料对你喂哺母乳有极大的帮助。

sentences.english: Breastfeeding pamphlets are available in our hospital to help you.
sentences.chinese: 本院提供之母乳育婴资料对你喂哺母乳有极大的帮助。

sentences.english: The company stays fully stocked with donated milk, Elster says, thanks to a team of paid mommy recruiters who cover the US.
sentences.chinese: 埃尔斯特说，公司里母乳的库存一直十分充足。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the effect of breast-feeding on infectious disease of infants.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨母乳喂养对婴儿患感染性疾病的影响。

sentences.english: There also are few maternal contraindications to breastfeeding.
sentences.chinese: 也有一些母亲原因的母乳禁忌症。

sentences.english: Mother's milk is one apocrine secretion.
sentences.chinese: 母乳是一种顶浆分泌液。

sentences.english: A mother who smokes can also pass nicotine to her baby through her breast milk.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟的母亲还有可能通过喂母乳把尼古丁传给婴儿。

definition: to suckle/to pump breast milk with a breast pump
